turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order for a pick up at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, let's get that order started for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order a grande cup caffè latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. and what type of milk did you want in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and was that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it hot with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you would like to order a grande cafe latte with whole milk and whipped cream from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to purchase now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order has been completed. Your drink will be ready at the Starbucks on rainbow and oakey in las vegas in 5 minutes. Enjoy!
